title: verify Z.ai API responses actually being used
description:
Verify that API responses from Z.ai provider are actually being sent and received correctly. Add request/response logging to Z.ai handler to confirm:
- Correct endpoint is being called (https://api.z.ai/api/coding/paas/v4 or appropriate line)
- Correct auth headers with zaiApiKey
- Response correctly parsed from Z.ai API
- Model responses match expected Z.ai format

This follows kc-xs6 fix for Z.ai schema validation.

title: fix CLI status bar showing stale provider info
description:
Status bar in CLI TUI is displaying stale provider/model information. When user selects Z.ai provider via /provider list command, the status bar continues showing 'xAI: Grok Code Fast 1' instead of 'Z.ai | GLM 4.7'.

Root cause: StatusBar component's apiConfigurationAtom is not being properly updated when provider is selected via TUI commands.

Expected: After /provider select zai, status bar should immediately reflect:
  - Provider: Z.ai
  - Model: glm-4.7 (or appropriate selected model)

Affects: CLI TUI UX - confusing for users to see different provider in status vs provider list

Note: Underlying API calls ARE using correct provider (verified via kc-4h9), this is UI-only issue.

title: fix ZAI Provider not woking, GH#5351
description: use gh cli to get issue details, then diagnose and fix. Create sub issues and agents as needed
